entry.title: KidsCan busy making lunches for children in need with school back across New Zealand

media:group.media:title: The Skipper
media:group.media:description: It’s one of our country’s most important jobs. The new All Black captain is Sam Cane, a farm boy from Reporoa, who had to overcome a horror injury that came close to leaving him in a wheelchair. SUNDAY visits Sam and new wife, Harriet, and unearths a surprising side to the young man charged with returning the All Blacks to the top of the world.

media:group.media:title: In The Zoo
media:group.media:description: For a place that only ever closes for Christmas Day, gates at Auckland Zoo have been shut now for the past six weeks. But have the animals noticed the lack of human visitors? And have they missed us? We get special entry on the first day of level 2.

entry.title: Have you been offered a job on Facebook – or seen ads for kiwi companies selling on Facebook?

media:group.media:title: Have you been offered a job on Facebook – or seen ads for kiwi companies selling on Facebook?
media:group.media:description: Be very careful and check they are legit. If you don’t, you could wind up being scammed - or even help scammers rip other people off. If you think you have been a victim of this or another scam and have lost money, let us know.

media:group.media:title: Inside Parliament: Next Level Budget
media:group.media:description: 1 NEWS political reporters review this week’s big news from the Beehive.
